name: Paragon Pool
description: A solana based token with a lottery function. Every week, the winner will recieve 1% of all transactions for the week with a new winner selected every cycle. Its a safer smarter lottery with 100% transparency. Now playing the lottery is responsible. You can invest and play the lottery at the same time. Lottery tickets never expire, can gain value, and you can sell your tokens after the drawing to get what you spent back. No other lottery lets you trade in expired lottery tickets
